title: Hillman Tribe (4C25)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Dunland
Twilight:	3
Card Type:	Minion • Man
Strength:	9
Vitality:	1
Site:	3
Game Text:	Each time this minion wins a skirmish, you may spot another [Dunland] minion to take control of a site.
Lore:	”'They will not quail at the sun… the wild men of the hills.'”
Rarity:	C
